description: Isle of Man homes will receive a prepaid postcard to send on to loved ones, the post office says.
title: Coronavirus: Free Isle of Man postcards to 'send hope' to those isolating
title_page: Coronavirus: Free Isle of Man postcards to 'send hope' to those isolating - BBC News
maintext: He said the initiative was "another example of people in the Isle of Man from different fields coming together to help those buffeted and bruised by the coronavirus crisis".
